title: Online shopping in the era of AI is confusing
description: Generative artificial intelligence is all over the online shopping space  but has that actually made the experience better? The Verge reporter Mia Sato did a try-on and review of clothes by the AI fashion brand Finesse. And afterwards, she tested AI-powered e-commerce tools that generate images and product descriptions.
